scripts: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS orders CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INTEGER, order_type TEXT, date_placed TEXT, order_qty INTEGER, order_price INTEGER);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS execution CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE execution (execution_id INTEGER, order_id INTEGER, execution_date TEXT, execution_qty INTEGER, execution_price INTEGER);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS queries CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE queries (query_name TEXT, code TEXT);

INSERT INTO queries VALUES ('AVG_EXEC_PRICE', 'SELECT AVG(execution_price) FROM execution'), ('COUNT_EXECUTIONS', 'SELECT COUNT(execution_id) FROM execution'), ('MIN_ORDER_DATE', 'SELECT MIN(date_placed) FROM orders'), ('SUM_ORD_QTY', 'SELECT SUM(order_qty) FROM orders');
